itunes:title: Episode 530 - The Death Of Qasem Soleimani Part 1
title: Episode 530 - The Death Of Qasem Soleimani Part 1
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hamody Jasim the author/director of "The Terrorist Whisperer" to discuss what it means from an Iraqi perspective what the death of Qasem Soleimani means to his country and as a Command Sergeant Major ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hamody Jasim the author/director of "The Terrorist Whisperer" to discuss what it means from an Iraqi perspective what the death of Qasem Soleimani means to his country and as a Command Sergeant Major of the Iraqi military.  Tomorrow we bring you Part 2 from the perspectives of all four branches of the military.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hamody Jasim the author/director of "The Terrorist Whisperer" to discuss what it means from an Iraqi perspective what the death of Qasem Soleimani means to his country and as a Command Sergeant Major of the Iraqi military.  Tomorrow we bring you Part 2 from the perspectives of all four branches of the military.
